#Text= Aang says : " You ca n't give them more weapons .

column1: #Text=" Mechanist says : " If I do n't give them what they want , they will destroy this place !
#Text=" Teo says : " How can I be proud of you when your inventions are being used for murder ?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " I need some time to think .
#Text=" Qin says : " You know better than to keep me waiting .
#Text=Give me what you owe us so we can be on our way .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " No , right this way .
#Text=" Qin says : " The Avatar ... " Mechanist says : " Aang , do n't get involved !
#Text=" Qin says : " If I do n't get what I came here for , the Fire Nation will burn this place to rubble !
#Text=" Aang says : " Get out of here !
#Text=" Qin says : " Then the destruction of this temple will be on your head !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , what are we going to do ?
#Text=How can we possibly keep them all away ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll tell you how .
#Text=That 's something the Fire Nation ca n't do .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " I want to help .
